best-practices.title: Best Practices for CMMC Success
best-practices.description: Follow these guidelines to maximize your chances of achieving CMMC certification.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about the Bedrock CMMC Platform and the certification process.

intro.title: CMMC Customer Guide
intro.description: Welcome to the Bedrock CMMC Platform. This guide walks you through using the platform to prepare for and achieve your CMMC (Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification) certification.

user-guide/assessments.title: Tracking Assessments
user-guide/assessments.description: Monitor and manage your C3PAO assessment engagements.

user-guide/asset-inventory.title: Asset Inventory
user-guide/asset-inventory.description: Track all systems, devices, and components within your CMMC boundary.

user-guide/ato-packages.title: ATO Packages
user-guide/ato-packages.description: An ATO Package represents a system or boundary you're preparing for CMMC certification.

user-guide/c3pao-marketplace.title: C3PAO Marketplace
user-guide/c3pao-marketplace.description: Find and engage certified assessors for your CMMC assessment.

user-guide/control-assessment.title: Control Assessment
user-guide/control-assessment.description: Assess your security controls against NIST SP 800-171 requirements.

user-guide/evidence.title: Evidence Management
user-guide/evidence.description: Evidence documents support your compliance claims during C3PAO assessments.

user-guide/poam.title: Plan of Action & Milestones (POA&M)
user-guide/poam.description: POA&Ms track remediation efforts for identified compliance gaps.

user-guide/ssp.title: System Security Plan (SSP)
user-guide/ssp.description: The SSP documents your security posture and control implementations.
